metadata.synopsis: Los Angeles police detectives (Robert Loggia, Leo Rossi) track the so-called Sunset Killer (Judd Nelson), who taunts them with messages.

reviews: Rather than provoking a twisted examination of the pathology of the police/criminal mind. Relentless unfortunately settles into a rather bland police buddy story.
Nelson gives one of the most gripping performances of his career
...director William Lustig tries his best to infuse the movie with a decent amount of style.
